user_prompt: Write a Django REST Framework API with serializers, viewsets, and token authentication for a task management app.
Build a Spring Boot microservice with JPA repositories, Flyway migrations, and Actuator health endpoints.
Create a Ruby on Rails API with ActiveRecord models, Pundit authorization, and Sidekiq background jobs.
Design a GraphQL API using Apollo Server with TypeScript resolvers, DataLoader batching, and schema federation.
Explain how to set up Prometheus alerting rules and Grafana dashboards for monitoring Kubernetes pod metrics.
Write a PHP Laravel application with Eloquent ORM, Blade templates, and Pest PHP unit tests.
Build a Vue 3 frontend with Pinia state management, Vue Router, and Vitest component tests.
Explain the principles of eventual consistency in distributed systems and the saga pattern for distributed transactions.
Write a Flutter mobile app with Riverpod state management, GoRouter navigation, and integration tests.
Design a data warehouse schema using dbt transformations with incremental models and snapshot tables.
I need to unit test my code. I'm using pytest with fixtures, parametrize, and mock patches for my Python web scraper.
Configure dependency injection in my Angular app using providers, injection tokens, and lazy-loaded module scopes.
Set up GitHub Actions CI for my Node.js project with npm caching, ESLint, and Jest test coverage reporting.
Profile memory leaks in my Java application using JVisualVM, MAT heap dumps, and GC logging analysis.
Implement OAuth 2.0 PKCE flow in my React SPA with token refresh, secure storage, and CSRF protection.
Build a Rust async web server using Axum with Tower middleware, SQLx database layer, and Tokio runtime configuration.
Set up EF Core migrations for my Python project. Wait, I mean SQLAlchemy Alembic migrations for PostgreSQL.
Create containerized microservices using Docker Compose with Nginx reverse proxy, Redis cache, and PostgreSQL for my Go application.
